profile:
RMB Communication Systems Inc. in St. Thomas, ON specializes in telecommunication and security solutions. Our wide range of services includes a full line of alarm and security products, certified structured network cabling, a full line of telecommunications equipment and VOIP solutions as well as SIP (voip) telephone lines and more.

We have proudly been serving our customers since 1995. Our customers rely on us for excellent and personalized customer service. Serving industrial, commercial and residential.

Our Mission
RMB Communication Systems has a firm policy to never oversell to clients while providing products and services that are second to none.

100% Commitment to Customer Satisfaction
Our client base grows steadily year after year, and the success of our business can be attributed to high customer satisfaction. We even encourage potential new clients to speak with our existing customers.

When you work with us, we will take note of your requirements, keep your budget in mind, and provide you with a quote. You can also be confident that we will offer services or products that meet or exceed your needs. We understand that the upfront cost associated with a complete business network, security, as well as telecommunications can be overwhelming. Please ask about the possibility of an easy cost effective payment plan.

Main phone number 519-633-0080
Email rmbcommunications@gmail.com

profile:
Who We Are
For over 15 years general contractor Monty Romeo has been devoted to offering his construction services and project management skills across Ontario.  After many years of running multiple companies with dedication and great success, Monty founded  his construction company Innovative Framework.  He and his team of home builders will work with you to build a team that will best suit your needs for your new home.

What We Do
From design to construction, all aspects of our projects are matched with professionals to ensure the project is delivered and completed as designed and planned with the homeowner.  Our commercial and residential projects include both new construction and repairs/restorations.  Occupied and fully operational job sites are never an issue, we can also plan, manage, and build multi-phase projects and sites.  

Why Choose Us?
Our goal is an end-to-end client experience that includes seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, onsite organization and substantial quality workmanship every time. Call us today and bring our project management skills and extensive construction experience to your next project.
